title: No, the U.S. Republic of Elhan Omar did not provide "reasonable" military advice to Iran
subtitle: An article by anti-Muslim activist Robert Spencer stimulating threats and incitement to violence and murder against Minnesota Congresswoman in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2020, the Republic of Elhan Omar advised Iran to attack the Trump-marked hotels in the world, resulting in treason.
